statements.select: SELECT a.obj_id, b.db_name, c.sql_clause, c.param_dft_val, c.ds_eng_name, c.ds_typ FROM dsk_obj a LEFT JOIN dsk_db_cfg b ON a.db_name = b.db_name LEFT JOIN dsk_data_sour_def c ON a.obj_id = c.obj_id AND nvl(b.db_typ, ${dbTyp}) = c.db_typ WHERE a.obj_id = ${id}

SELECT a.obj_id, b.db_name, c.sql_clause, c.param_dft_val, c.ds_eng_name, c.ds_typ FROM dsk_obj a LEFT JOIN dsk_db_cfg b ON a.db_name = b.db_name LEFT JOIN dsk_data_sour_def c ON a.obj_id = c.obj_id AND nvl(b.db_typ, ${dbTyp}) = c.db_typ WHERE c.ds_eng_name = ${name}
